title: CVS Health Names Melissa Schulman Senior Vice President of Government and Public Affairs (CVS Health ...
text: ( Source : CVS Health Corporation ) WOONSOCKET, R.I. , October 2, 2015 - CVS Health ( NYSE : CVS) today announced that Melissa Schulman has been appointed Senior Vice President of Government and Public Affairs . In this role, Schulman will lead
